patthana15.81:4.1: Araṇaṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.81:5.1: Araṇaṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.81:6.1: Araṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
